short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a button to Google that appends 'reddit' to your search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Google search with easy-to-access buttons for Reddit, Quora, GitHub, and Stack Overflow! Quickly filter your search results to focus on these popular platforms, perfect for research, programming, or finding community-driven insights.
